text: The student will analyze and interpret artwork using art vocabulary.
subject: Visual Art
subs: Describe the visual qualities and content of works of art.
Describe similarities and differences among works of art.
Describe how ideas, opinions, and emotions are communicated in works of art

text: The student will apply creative thinking to artmaking.
subject: Visual Art

text: The student will share a response to art and explain why viewers may have different responses to works of art.
subject: Visual Art
